chartsDemo.title: Demo: shadcn/ui charts implementation
chartsDemo.description: This page demonstrates how to use shadcn/ui charts to display data. For more information, check the docs on the link below.
chartsDemo.warningDescription: This is a placeholder for the actual charts. The data is not real and the charts are not connected to the actual data.

cashflow.projectProfitabilityDescription: Detailed profitability metrics for all projects
cashflow.weeklyInvestmentNewDesc: Total spend, not including renovation costs
cashflow.weeklyMarginDesc: Expected margin / expected construction time (6 weeks)
cashflow.cashflowProjectionDesc: Projected inflows, outflows, and net liquidity

dataSource.weeklyInvestment: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - calculated from arrasAmount + outstandingAmount fields across all active projects
dataSource.weeklyProjectValue: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - calculated from salePrice/soldPrice vs total project costs
dataSource.weeklyValueMargin: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - average weekly value creation as percentage of project cost
dataSource.activeProjects: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - count of projects not marked as 'Completed / Sold'
dataSource.avgProgress: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - progress percentage extracted from project names (e.g., '75% Project Name')
dataSource.completingThisMonth: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - estimated based on projects with progress ≥90%
dataSource.zoneDistribution: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - zone indicator parsed from project names (e.g., '| PMI |')
dataSource.phaseCapacity: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - project status mapping to phases (Purchase, Construction, Sale/Rental) with defined capacity limits per phase
dataSource.cashflowProjection: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - calculated from estimated cashflow events including purchase deposits, construction costs, sale revenue, and rental income based on project timelines
dataSource.projectProfitability: Data from Monday.com Development Projects board - calculated from arrasAmount + outstandingAmount + construction costs (50% of purchase price) vs salePrice/soldPrice, with profitability margins and weekly value creation estimates
dataSource.weeklyInvestmentNew: Data from Monday.com Property Database board - calculated from acquisition price (numbers4) + taxes (numbers95), not including renovation costs
dataSource.avgMonthlySpend: Data from Monday.com Property Database board - calculated as ((total spend * 52) / 12) from acquisition price + taxes
dataSource.weeklyMargin: Data from Monday.com Property Database board - calculated from pessimistic sales price (numbers90) - total cost (acquisition + renovation + taxes) divided by 6 weeks
dataSource.generatedValue: Data from Monday.com Property Database board - calculated as weekly margin - weekly investment

monday.linkAccountDescription: Connect your Monday.com account to access boards, KPIs, and project data directly within the dashboard.
monday.featuresDescription: Access project boards, KPI tracking, and real-time data synchronization.
